_header: Absence of thou causeth me to sigh and complain
Note:
Cf. 640; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 57.
_description: Ease my heart, mistress — one stanza rhyme royal.
